title: The area of built up amenity shall be counted in FSI initially and after handing over of said built up amenity the area of built up amenity shall be allowed free of FSI
clause_text: The area of built up amenity shall be counted in FSI initially and after handing over of said built up amenity the area of built up amenity shall be allowed free of FSI. Commencement Certificate in respect of BUA in lieu of the built-up amenity handed over to MCGM under AR can be granted only after handing over of such built up amenity.
